synopsis.text: As part of the "Memories" anthology, three captivating tales unfold, each with its own unique blend of suspense, dark humor, and introspection. In "Magnetic Rose," a space crew investigates a distress signal, only to stumble upon a seemingly abandoned space station filled with eerie remnants of a bygone era. As they delve deeper, they uncover a haunting love story that blurs the lines between reality and memory. In "Stink Bomb," a young lab worker's quest for cold relief takes a disastrous turn when he accidentally ingests an experimental drug, transforming him into a lethal walking bioweapon. As he desperately seeks help, he leaves a trail of chaos and destruction in his wake. Lastly, "Cannon Fodder" invites viewers into a dystopian city perpetually at war, where every citizen is tasked with maintaining and firing colossal cannons at an unseen enemy. Through the eyes of a young boy, the story raises thought-provoking questions about the nature of obedience and the true cost of warfare. This anime masterpiece promises a thrilling and reflective journey, expertly weaving together distinct narratives that will leave a lasting impression.
